price: 3 Laisse-les donc se repaître, jouir de cette vie et se bercer d’espérances. Ils sauront bientôt ce qui les attend !
arabic: ذَرۡهُمۡ يَأۡكُلُواْ وَيَتَمَتَّعُواْ وَيُلۡهِهِمُ ٱلۡأَمَلُۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: dharhum yakulū wayatamattaʿū wayul'hihimu al-amalu fasawfa yaʿlamūna
